___start.description: The start date of this obligation period
___start.title: Start date

___processed.description: Date the end of period statement submission was processed by HMRC. Populated only when met flag has the value `true`
___processed.title: Processed date

___due.description: The due date for this obligation period
___due.title: Due date

___met.description: True if this obligation period has been met; false otherwise
___met.title: Met

___end.description: The end date of this obligation period
___end.title: End date
